column1: Now is the time to pick the cherries! shouted Charles as he came running in from the garden one July afternoon."Are they quite ripe?" said his mother."Ripe? I should think so. Just look at them!" answered Charles
column2: pointing to the trees."O mamma!" said Mary
column3: "the birds are getting them all. We must have them picked at once.""Never fear
column5: said her mother. There will be enough for the birds and ourselves and our neighbors too. But it really is time to begin to pick them. So
